document.full_text: china said on friday it complied with "most measures at issue" in an international trade ruling made against its restrictions on copyright-intensive goods such as films, books and music.
document.title: u.s. says sanctions possible in china copyright spat
lines_and_colors: china said on friday it complied with "most measures at issue" in an international trade ruling made against its restrictions on copyright-intensive goods such as films, books and music.
